original_text: Jesus got out of the boat. He saw a large crowd there on the shore. He felt sorry for them. There were sick people among them and he made them well again.
korean_text: 예수께서 나오사 큰 무리를 보시고 불쌍히 여기사 그 중에 있는 병자를 고쳐 주시니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus got out of the boat.
He saw a large crowd there on the shore.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 해변에 많은 무리가 있는 것을 보셨다.

sentences.original_text: There were sick people among them
and he made them well again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들을 다시 낫게 하셨다.
